function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Restricted data access due to commercial or financial reasons","Impact":"Limited access to important data for disease analysis and mitigation","Mitigation":"Implement open data sharing initiatives and regulations","Technologies":"Data sharing platforms and open research publishing platforms","People":"Researchers, healthcare professionals, and public health authorities","Owner":"Research organizations, government bodies, and regulatory agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of data sharing for non-clinical trial data in COVID-19","Impact":"Inability to access comprehensive data for disease analysis and mitigation","Mitigation":"Promote and distribute data sharing of non-clinical trial data","Technologies":"Non-commercial data sharing platforms","People":"Researchers, healthcare professionals, and public health authorities","Owner":"Research organizations and non-commercial groups"},{"Description":"Reproducibility concern in clinical research, especially for digital-health technologies","Impact":"Risk of fraudulent research activities and unreliable findings","Mitigation":"Implement strict reproducibility and transparency standards in clinical research","Technologies":"Digital-health technology verification and validation tools","People":"Researchers, healthcare professionals, and public health authorities","Owner":"Research organizations and regulatory agencies"}]}
